Methods

commit

  • commit(): TransactionReceipt

  • Implementation of BusTransaction.commit

    • Defined in src/bus/transaction.ts:81

    Commit the transaction, all requests will be sent and will wait for responses. Once all the responses are in, onComplete will be called with the responses.

    Returns TransactionReceipt

onComplete

  • onComplete<Resp>(completeHandler: MessageFunction<Resp[]>): void

  • Implementation of BusTransaction.onComplete

    • Defined in src/bus/transaction.ts:71

    Once all responses to requests have been received, the transaction is complete. The handler will return an array or all responses in the order the requests were sent.

    Type parameters

    • Resp

    Parameters

    • completeHandler: MessageFunction<Resp[]>

    Returns void

onError

  • onError<T>(errorHandler: MessageFunction<T>): void

  • Implementation of BusTransaction.onError

    • Defined in src/bus/transaction.ts:110

    If an error is thrown by any of the responders, the transaction is aborted and the error sent to the errorHandler.

    Type parameters

    • T

    Parameters

    • errorHandler: MessageFunction<T>

    Returns void
